about_the_game:
"Pioneer Your Path in Auroria, the Land of Opportunity"


▶A World of Story and Adventure

It is the Age of Pioneers. Auroria, a legend long forgotten, has been rediscovered. Now, many hopeful pioneers are headed to this distant land to make a name for themselves. As an experienced explorer, you will be taking your first steps into Auroria as a member of an established trading company. As you embark on this new adventure, you will explore ancient ruins, investigate a catastrophic airship crash, and become embroiled in the web of intrigue surrounding the mysterious and tragic event. Along the way you will meet many characters shrouded in mystery, each with their own secrets and goals. Who will help you and who will stand against you as you experience the unfolding story of Auroria in ArcheAge Chronicles?

▶Action-Packed Combat

Experience intense battles that will keep you on the edge of your seat. ArcheAge Chronicles transcends traditional MMORPG mechanics with its fluid, sophisticated action combat. Choose from a variety of weapons and skills to create a unique build and overcome powerful foes. Explore a wide range of combat styles including close-quarters melee, deadly ranged attacks, and powerful magic. Engage dynamically as you jump, fall, roll, dash, block, and parry. No matter your preferred playstyle, ArcheAge Chronicles delivers a high-quality combat experience.

▶Unique Features and Innovations

Engage in rich life skills content such as hunting, gathering, housing, farming, and crafting. Learn new recipes, trade with other players, and build a pioneer society together. Explore an open world of unparalleled freedom, embark on thrilling trading runs, and traverse territories fraught with peril. Fight alongside comrades to defend your trade routes from dangerous enemies. Before you know it, you will have made your mark on the world of Auroria as a legendary pioneer.

▶Join the Adventure

Are you ready to start your journey? Join the adventure in ArcheAge Chronicles and experience the next evolution of the MMORPG genre. Gather your allies, sharpen your blades, and explore the endless possibilities of Auroria to forge your own epic destiny!

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing in a work environment, including blood, violence, and general mature content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400/AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Ti
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700/AMd Ryzen 7 5700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti
  • Storage: 100 GB available space

short_description: Explore Auroria, a vast and vibrant world brimming with rich lore and thrilling action. ArcheAge Chronicles delivers an immersive experience that will capture players' hearts, whether they are newcomers to the setting or seasoned adventurers.
